New email from Rob McClure <notifications@github.com>
Subject: Re: [stonerl/Thaw] [Bug]: Hidden items are unstable when Menu Bar Appearance is customized (Issue #86)

robmcclure left a comment (stonerl/Thaw#86)

I’ve updated to beta.8(13). I also have selected the new option to adjust based upon the display, since I have two large displays in addition to the MBP with a notch. In this version I can now select TM so it is working. It is slow but it works.
￼
. . .
All content represents my view only

Current time: Sunday, February 15th, 2026 — 7:59 PM (America/New_York)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.

**Assessment:**
- Not a login code, verification code, or 2FA
- Not a billing alert or payment issue
